description:
Though Kawachi has departed for the main store, life has returned to normal for the South Tokyo branch. Or has it? The villainous Yukino is still plotting to take down the South Tokyo store, so Kanmuri proposes a risky plan to save the bakery!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyakuoku no Otoko!? Pantasia Sonbou no Kiki!
L`homme qui valait 10 milliards ! Pantasia est en crise !
The Ten-Billion Yen Man!? Pantasia`s Fate Hangs in the Balance!
บุรุษพันล้าน!? ปังตาเซียวิกฤติแล้ว!
百億の男!? パンタジア存亡の危機!
